io.artframework

Interface ArtContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Context, ResultCreator, Scoped, TargetCreator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombinedArtContext, DefaultArtContext

    public interface ArtContext
extends Context, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ResultCreator, TargetCreator

      • settings

        ArtSettings settings()
        Provides settings used in this ArtContext. Use these settings to fine tune the executing and testing of ArtObjects in this ArtContext.

        By default the Scope.settings() will be used you can override those settings by updating the underlying object.

        Returns:
        settings that control the behaviour of this ArtContext

      • getArtContexts

        java.util.Collection<ArtObjectContext<?>> getArtContexts()
        Gets an immutable list of the art object contexts contained within this art context.
        Returns:
        list of all contexts within this context

      • test

        <TTarget> CombinedResult test(@NonNull
                              @NonNull Target<TTarget> target)
        Tests if all requirements for the given target pass. Will return false if any requirement or global filter fail. Will return true if requirements are empty after filtering for the target type.

        Global filters are always checked before checking requirements. This means that persistent counted requirements will never be checked and increased.

        Type Parameters:
        TTarget - type of the target. Any requirements not matching the target type will not be checked.
        Parameters:
        target - target to check. Can be null.
        Returns:
        true if all requirement checks and filter pass or if the list of requirements is empty (after filtering the target type). false if any filter or requirement check fails.

      • test

        default <TTarget> CombinedResult test(@NonNull
                                      TTarget target)
        Wraps the given target into a Target and then calls test(Target). Returns false if no Target wrapper was found for the given source.
        Type Parameters:
        TTarget - type of the target
        Parameters:
        target - target object to wrap into a Target
        Returns:
        result of test(Target) or false if no Target wrapper exists
        See Also:
        test(Target)

      • execute

        FutureResult execute(@NonNull
                     Target<?>... target)
        Executes all Actions and child actions of actions against the given target. Will do nothing if the target type does not match the target type of the action.

        Any Requirements will be checked before executing the actions. No action will be executed if any filter or requirement fails.

        Parameters:
        target - target to execute actions against. Can be null.

      • execute

        default FutureResult execute(@NonNull
                             java.lang.Object... targets)
        Wraps the given target into a Target and then calls execute(Target...). Does nothing if no Target wrapper was found for the given source.
        Parameters:
        targets - target to execute actions for

      • onTrigger

        <TTarget> void onTrigger(java.lang.Class<TTarget> targetClass,
                         TriggerListener<TTarget> listener)
        Listens on all Triggers in the ArtContext for the given target type. You can add multiple TriggerListeners of the same target type and all of them will get informed.

        You will only get informed of the trigger execution after all previous checks have passed and after all Actions of this ArtContext have been executed.

        Type Parameters:
        TTarget - type of the target
        Parameters:
        targetClass - class of the target you wish to listen for
        listener - function to react to the trigger

      • combine

        ArtContext combine(ArtContext context)
        Combines this ArtContext with the given ArtContext. Both contexts will keep their order and ArtObjectContexts as they are. The difference is a parent ArtContext that holds both of those contexts.
        Parameters:
        context - The ArtContext that should be combined with this context
        Returns:
        the new combined ArtContext

      • enableTrigger

        ArtContext enableTrigger()
        Enables all configured trigger in this context, registering them as listeners.

        Use this method if you want to register all trigger in the config as listeners. Do not use this if triggers are not intended in your config.

        Returns:
        this art context

      • disableTrigger

        ArtContext disableTrigger()
        Disables all triggers in this context, unregistering them as listeners.

        Use this to cleanup your context.

        Returns:
        this art context

      • close

        void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
